article:
'Aerospace Education Services Project' (AESP) is a NASA education project which
delivers science, technology, engineering, and mathematics instruction to K-12
students and provides professional development to pre- and in-service
instructors. The project has education specialists working at all of the NASA
centers across the US who travel to schools and other organizations in order to
deliver these presentations to all 50 states. The project is managed by Peggy
Maher, Director and Michelle Ferebee at the Langley Research Center.
